info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Salle and northern McMullen Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Fowlerton, or 20 miles southwest of Tilden, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tilden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
